00024 #ifndef __SYS_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_H__
00025 #define __SYS_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_H__
00026 
00027 #include "sys/OS.h"
00028 
00029 namespace sys
00030 {
00031 class DirectoryEntry
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     class Iterator;
00035     friend class Iterator;
00036     DirectoryEntry(const std::string& dirName) : mDirName(dirName)
00037     {
00038         mCurrent = mDir.findFirstFile(dirName.c_str());
00039         mFirst.reset(this);
00040         mLast.reset(NULL);
00041     }
00042     virtual ~DirectoryEntry()
00043     {}
00044     virtual void next()
00045     {
00046         mCurrent = mDir.findNextFile();
00047     }
00048     virtual const char* getCurrent() const
00049     {
00050         return mCurrent;
00051     }
00052     virtual const std::string& getName() const
00053     {
00054         return mDirName;
00055     }
00056 
00057     class Iterator
00058     {
00059     public:
00060         Iterator() : mEntry(NULL)
00061         {}
00062         explicit Iterator(DirectoryEntry* dirEntry) : mEntry(dirEntry)
00063         {}
00064 
00065 
00066         void reset(DirectoryEntry* dirEntry)
00067         {
00068             mEntry = dirEntry;
00069         }
00070         Iterator& operator++()
00071         {
00072             mEntry->next();
00073             if (mEntry->mCurrent == NULL) mEntry = NULL;
00074             return *this;
00075         }
00076         const char* operator*() const
00077         {
00078             if (!mEntry->mCurrent)
00079                 throw except::NullPointerReference(Ctxt("DirectoryEntry::Iterator NULL entry not allowed"));
00080             return mEntry->mCurrent;
00081         }
00082         DirectoryEntry* get() const
00083         {
00084             return mEntry;
00085         }
00086 
00087         DirectoryEntry* operator->() const
00088         {
00089             return get();
00090         }
00091 
00092     private:
00093         DirectoryEntry* mEntry;
00094 
00095     };
00096 
00097     const Iterator& begin() const
00098     {
00099         return mFirst;
00100     }
00101     const Iterator& end() const
00102     {
00103         return mLast;
00104     }
00105 
00106 
00107 private:
00108     Iterator mFirst;
00109     Iterator mLast;
00110     const char* mCurrent;
00111     std::string mDirName;
00112     Directory mDir;
00113     //   DirectoryEntry mDirLast;
00114 
00115 
00116 };
00117 
00118 
00119 
00120 }
